generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending across the frame, including the area in front of the vehicle.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: Buildings are visible in the background, lining the street on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the roadside and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings in the background.
- car: A white car is visible in the distance, driving on the road.
- truck: A large white truck is prominently visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with traffic signs and another near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are mounted on poles in the background.
- person: A person can be seen inside the cab of the white truck.
